text:
Hi guys, 

In about 30 minutes to one hour I managed to deploy MEAN onto a Heroku instance. If you would like to know what that is, how to do it, etc. - message me and I will be happy to explain. 

Production version is running up at: <http://votee-project.herokuapp.com/>

attachments.title: Votee - Votee
attachments.text: MEAN - A Modern Stack: MongoDB, ExpressJS, AngularJS, NodeJS. (BONUS: Passport User Support).
attachments.fallback: MEAN - A Modern Stack: Votee - Votee

text: Everything you commit to ```master``` will also automatically be deployed via a daily build. It is part of Heroku’s CI that I enabled.
so from now on - watch out when you commit to master :simple_smile:
